description: Self-hostable web app for food and recipe nutrition tracking.

MEDIA_DISK.description: Media disk. Set to 's3-public' for recipe/user image support.

AWS_BUCKET.description: AWS bucket name for recipe/user image storage. Required when MEDIA_DISK is 's3-public'.

AWS_DEFAULT_REGION.description: AWS region for AWS_BUCKET. Required when MEDIA_DISK is 's3-public'.

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: AWS access key ID for AWS_BUCKET. Required when MEDIA_DISK is 's3-public'.

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS secret key ID for AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID. Required when MEDIA_DISK is 's3-public'.

scripts.postdeploy: php artisan migrate --force && php artisan user:add kcal kcal --name=Admin --admin
